titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of October as "National Domestic Violence Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Original National Domestic Violence Awareness Month Resolution of 2019
This resolution expresses support for (1) National Domestic Violence Awareness Month; (2) continuing to raise awareness about domestic violence and its devastating effects on individuals, families, and communities; and (3) developing programs designed to end domestic violence.
